Question:
What is new feature of Segment LCD Controller?
Answer:
RA2A2 supports new modes that are VL2 reference mode at internal voltage boosting method and VL4 reference mode at capacitor split method. Because efficiency of voltage generation for panel drive able to improve by these two new modes, these contribute power consumption efficiency of end-products. Furthermore, please check RA2A2 Blog describing this feature.
Suitable Products
RA2A2
